EmailTemplate.subject: DealerCon Chicago Conference, April 16th-18, 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
The upcoming DealerCon Conference is right around the corner, April 15th - 17th in Rosemont, IL at the Donald Stephens Convention Center. As a sponsor, we hope to see you in attendance and reconnect with your dealership at the show.
- Meet the local VinSolutions team and learn more about our product enhancements!
- Come participate in Sean Stapleton's speaker workshop over "Big Data"!
Registration is still open, we look forward to seeing you there!
http://www.dealercon.com/register
We look forward to seeing you at DealerCon!
